query:
SELECT
                sh.user_id,
                u.full_name,
                u.nrp,
                u.phone,
                sh.satker_id,
                s.name AS satker_name,
                s.code AS satker_code,
                sh.active_from,
                sh.active_to,
                CASE
                    WHEN active_to IS NULL THEN 'AKTIF'
                    ELSE 'RETIRE'
                END AS status
            FROM satker_heads sh
            JOIN users u ON u.id = sh.user_id
            JOIN satkers s On s.id = sh.satker_id
            ORDER BY active_from DESC
